From: One Reach <OneReach@chalhoub.com>
To: 
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-05-14 13:48
Subject: Essential Secure Client Access Version Upgrade for HO1 VPN Users
--------------------------------------------------
 

 <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

 

Dear Colleague, 

 

Please note that essential maintenance has been scheduled for the HO1 Ivanti Secure VPN.

As a result, Users will receive Secure Access Client Version Upgrade prompt and user need to click on upgrade so Secure Access Client version will be upgraded automatically in backend later on Users can resume using VPN services.

 

This is non service Impacting Activity.

 

Maintenance start time: Wednesday, May 14, 2025, | 02:00 PM GST

Maintenance end time: Wednesday, May 14, 2025, | 03:00 PM GST


We appreciate your patience and cooperation as we work to enhance your experience with our services.


For support during this period, please raise a ticket via OneReach. You can also check real-time status updates via the Tech&Data System Status & Health <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/>  Dashboard.

 

 

 

This mail was sent to you by

 <https://onereach.chalhoub.com/support/home>
